title: Kothalavadi
overview: In the famine-stricken village of Kothalavadi, greed sparks chaos as a ruthless scrap dealer manipulates desperate villagers into illegal sand mining, using them as pawns in his quest for power. When tragedy strikes and blood is spilt, an iron-willed officer, a betrayed enforcer, and a cunning politician clash for control. As tensions rise, the villagers must choose: break free or be consumed by their greed.
